solution_line_template: The length of her head is {head_fraction}*{total_height} = <<{head_fraction}*{total_height}={head_length}>>{head_length} inches.
Together, her head and legs are {head_length}+{leg_length} = <<{head_length}+{leg_length}={head_and_legs_length}>>{head_and_legs_length} inches.

If her total height is {total_height}, the rest of her body has a length of {total_height}-{head_and_legs_length} = <<{total_height}-{head_and_legs_length}={rest_of_body_length}>>{rest_of_body_length} inches.
